Container.Name: FTB One
Container.Overview: FTB One Modded Minecraft Server[br][br][b]FTB One[/b][br]Our fastest ever produced modpack, unique jigsaw-based world gen, from dungeons to hidden ore clusters. All on a new era of Minecraft, 1.19.[br]Version tags available:[br] - 2.8.2[br] - 2.8.1[br] - 2.8.0[br] - 2.7.0[br][br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

Config.Name: Installed Location
Config.Description: Path to store the installed server files.

Config.Name: EULA
Config.Description: Do you agree to the Mojang EULA available at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula? Server will not start without accepting. Set to 'true' to accept.

Config.Name: OPS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability

Config.Name: LEVEL
Config.Description: Name of the world directory. It is usually world.
